known_good_quote.hex.description: Working attestation quote from secretAI VM in production

truncated_quote.hex.description: Truncated quote for error testing - first 1000 characters only

invalid_quote.hex.description: Invalid hex data for error testing

expected_fields.mrtd: measurement root of trust for deployment

notes: Known good quote is from actual secretAI production environment
All measurement registers should be 48-byte hex strings (96 characters)
Quote structure follows Intel TDX specification
attest_tool should extract same values as current hardcoded parsing
